title: Settings
content: Hello, When I add an account of the email mark@leadingedgeessentials.com, same configurations and all, still the Thunderbird prompt that "Cannot find settings of this email". I tried it in Outlook and its working. What is the possible issue with this?
creator: janpaulopilongco

title: Thunderbird latency
content: thunderbird was working perfectly and suddenly it takes twenty or thirty seconds to delete a block of 30 emails. This used to happen immediately. I have gone in and compacted every folder. Any help? Thanks so much
creator: valleyvillage
